channel.title: Confusing instructions for upgrade to SML
channel.description:
Hi,
When a new version of SML is available the instructions say we can get in from it's url but also says we don't have to. This can cause confusion.
Can it be clear as to whether we have to download the install or if it'll auto update itself when closed.
Cheers

item.title: Confusing instructions for upgrade to SML
item.dc:creator: @Clive_Flint Clive Flint
